report.name: x_pca4_detail_mois

reportHtmlEscapes.beforeReportHtmlEscape: <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN"> <html dir=&Direction> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=&Encoding"> </head> <body bgcolor="#ffffff">

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
select cm.clisigle DirMO, substr(to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000'),1,5) CODEDP, to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000') CODEDPG, S.libdsg LIBCODSG, lb.pcle CLE, lb.metier METIER, lb.clicode PCMOUVRA, lb.pid PID, lb.typproj TYPPROJ, lb.arctype TYPE2, lb.codcamo CODCAMO, rpad(lb.pnom,25) LIBPROJET, rpad(r.rnom,12) CHEFPROJET, nvl(conso_mois.janvier,0) janvier, nvl(conso_mois.fevrier,0) fevrier, nvl(conso_mois.mars,0) mars, nvl(conso_mois.avril,0) avril, nvl(conso_mois.mai,0) mai, nvl(conso_mois.juin,0) juin, nvl(conso_mois.juillet,0) juillet, nvl(conso_mois.aout,0) aout, nvl(conso_mois.septembre,0) septembre, nvl(conso_mois.octobre,0) octobre, nvl(conso_mois.novembre,0) novembre, nvl(conso_mois.decembre,0) decembre,
nvl(conso.cusag,0) CONSOJH, nvl(budg.reestime,0) REESTJH, nvl(budg.bpmontme,0) PROPOJH, nvl(budg.bnmont,0) NOTIFJH, nvl(budg.bpmontmo,0) PROPOMOJH, nvl(budg.anmont,0) ARBITJH, nvl(budg1.bpmontme,0) PROPOJH1, nvl(budg1.bpmontmo,0) PROPOMOJH1 from ligne_bip lb , struct_info S, proj_info pri , budget budg , budget budg1 , consomme conso , ressource r , client_mo cm ,
(select factpid pid, SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 1, proplus.cusag, 0)) janvier , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 2, proplus.cusag, 0)) fevrier , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 3, proplus.cusag, 0)) mars , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 4, proplus.cusag, 0)) avril , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 5, proplus.cusag, 0)) mai , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 6, proplus.cusag, 0)) juin , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 7, proplus.cusag, 0)) juillet , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 8, proplus.cusag, 0)) aout , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 9, proplus.cusag, 0)) septembre , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 10, proplus.cusag, 0)) octobre , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 11, proplus.cusag, 0)) novembre , SUM(DECODE(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(proplus.cdeb, 'MM')), 12, proplus.cusag, 0)) decembre from proplus, datdebex where (qualif not in ('MO','GRA','STA','IFO','INT') OR qualif is null) and cdeb >= datdebex group by factpid) conso_mois where lb.icpi = pri.icpi and lb.pid =conso_mois.pid (+) and S.codsg= lb.codsg and lb.clicode = cm.clicode and lb.pcpi = r.ident and lb.pid = budg.pid (+) and lb.pid = conso.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg1.pid (+) and lb.typproj!=9 and ( ( conso.cusag <> 0 AND conso.cusag is not null ) OR ( budg.reestime <> 0 AND budg.reestime is not null ) OR ( budg.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg.bpmontme is not null ) OR ( budg.bnmont <> 0 AND budg.bnmont is not null ) OR ( budg.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg.bpmontmo is not null ) OR (budg.anmont <> 0 AND budg.anmont is not null ) OR (budg1.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontme is not null) OR (budg1.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontmo is not null) ) and (lb.adatestatut IS NULL OR lb.adatestatut >= (select datdebex from datdebex) ) &P_WHERE
order by CODEDP, CODEDPG, PID;
